title: Taliban promise women's rights, security under Islamic rule
content:
1. Taliban promise women's rights, security under Islamic rule  Associated Press
  2. US choppers evacuate staff from Kabul the way it did in Saigon in 1975 | Afghanistan News | Taliban  WION
  3. Photo shows a US Air Force cargo plane crammed with 640 Afghans trying to flee the Taliban  Yahoo! Voices
  4. Over 600 Afghans cram into U.S. cargo plane in desperate flight from Kabul  Reuters
  5. Op-Ed: Our withdrawal from Afghanistan signals to the world that the U.S. can't be relied upon  Yahoo News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
